sections.text: Rice Business MBA cultivates principled leaders with strong analytical, strategic, and entrepreneurial skills to address complex global challenges.

items: First-year core in management, finance, accounting, leadership
Second-year electives, experiential learning, and global field experiences
sections.text: The MBA curriculum combines foundational courses with experiential learning, electives, and leadership labs.
Applicants must hold a bachelor's degree and submit transcripts, essays, resume, and a recommendation; GMAT/GRE optional.
Graduates pursue leadership roles in consulting, finance, energy, technology, and entrepreneurship.
